intro: Euphrasia multifolia, commonly known as the many-leaved eyebright, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Orobanchaceae family and is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that range in color from yellow to orange. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as woodlands and meadows. Its leaves are opposite and often covered in fine hairs, while its stems are erect and branching. Euphrasia multifolia is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
